essential_properties.name: docId
essential_properties.description: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: tableId
essential_properties.description: The table to create the row in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: docId
essential_properties.description: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: tableId
essential_properties.description: The table to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: rowId
essential_properties.description: ID or name of the row. Names are discouraged because they're easily prone to being changed by users. If you're using a name, be sure to URI-encode it. If there are multiple rows with the same value in the identifying column, an arbitrary one will be selected

essential_properties.name: docId
essential_properties.description: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: tableId
essential_properties.description: The table to get the rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: docId
essential_properties.description: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
